special_award.description: You can insta-kill low-level Shadows in Palaces or Mementos.
special_award.name: Infiltration Know-How

special_award.description: You can craft more Treasure Detectors, infiltration tools, and gifts.
special_award.name: Intermediate Crafting

special_award.description: Some materials may be returned after crafting gifts.
special_award.name: Efficient Prep

special_award.description: You may produce an extra item when crafting gifts.
special_award.name: Crafting Technique
